## Day 1: Points
A map with points.

```{r day 1}

phl_base <- read_sf("PhiladelphiaStreetCenterlines2020.shp") %>% 
  select(geometry) # only geometry

phl_base_all <- read_sf("PhiladelphiaStreetCenterlines2020.shp")

phl_trees <- st_read("69b39f50-460b-4b7b-b5ad-d8d9c491e4392020328-1-1vb911p.sd1c.shp")


ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = phl_base$geometry, color = 'darkgrey', size = .25) +
  geom_sf(data = phl_trees, size=.05, color='#235347') +
  coord_sf() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(), panel.grid.minor = element_blank())


```


## Day 2 
A map with lines.

```{r day 2}

phl_base <- read_sf("PhiladelphiaStreetCenterlines2020.shp") %>% 
  select(geometry) # only geometry

phl_hin <- st_read("high_injury_network_2020.shp")

phl_bike <- st_read("Bike_Network.shp")


ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = phl_base$geometry, color = 'darkgrey', size = .25, alpha = .3) +
  geom_sf(data = phl_hin, size=.5, color='darkorange2', alpha = .5) +
  geom_sf(data = phl_bike, color = 'cyan4', size = .5, alpha = .5) +
  #coord_sf() +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_blank(), panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = 'black'))




```
